name: Ray Gun
description: Looks like a hand gun, but with a whole lotta -- well like fins and shit.
success_message: Morty! I said to put that away! If you start blasting things in these mines we'll set off one of the Plutonian Reactors! Oh Sweet Jesus! Stop shooting! Holy -- wow, Morty, we gotta t-t-t-take you to a firing range or something. You can't just take out a gun and shoot it. But on the plus side, you did blow open one of those Reactor Computers. Let's look around and see if we can loot it!
failure_messages: Surely even Jerry and Beth have taught you not to play with guns, Morty. The last thing we need is to lose an eye or two. Do you know how expensive it is to get a Grade A Morty eye at this time of day? Let's just say more schmeckles than we could earn in three lifetimes.
Holster up, Morty, we will need to save that for whatever no good scum bags took your sister.
Morty, keep that in the bag, we don't want to end up on any intergalactic wanted lists. Well, more intergalactic wanted lists.
